author: Ibraheem Saleh
content:
The page won't let me add to the education or applications section so here it is:

Education:
Read the Seam Carving Paper at this Link:
https://inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~cs194-26/fa16/hw/proj4-seamcarving/imret.pdf

Here are some examples:

![Seam Carving Example 1](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1S6tdqaaUvmxja7FAPjhxv716yp8ke28d)

[Seam Carving Example 2](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1l9XCWhv6zyevjZtUBodTH_LH0wrxFlqp)

[Seam Carving Example 3](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1y4rygU5r7Z2L_XbQKc-FK0JZr6NcF1Kh)

Applications:
Seam carving is used in image processing and is readily available in multiple open-source libraries such as OpenCV and sklearn.
